item.description:
Time to officially kick off the mtb season. This is a great way to learn the fells as nemba does a great job of marking all the trails.

There will be guided rides plus marked loops for riders of all abilities. Many local bike shops (Wheelworks, CycleLoft, JRA and more) and riding destinations (Highland Mountain Bike Park) will be in attendance plus bike demos from Santa Cruz, Moots and others.

CycleLoft will be firing up their grille, and Forza-G will be holding their BBQ fundraiser for the Dana-Farber Cancer Institute, via the PMC.

Where: Middlesex Fells - Flynn Rink
When: Sunday, May 4th, 2013, 9am-3pm
Cost: NEMBA Members: $10, Non-members: $25, Renewing or joining NEMBA: Free
The cost goes to improving trail conditions at the Fells.


Schedule:
9:00 AM Guided Rides - Hammer Ride
9:00 AM Guided Rides - Intermediate
9:30 AM Guided Ride - Social Ride
9:30 AM - 10:00 AM Ride Like a Girl! Beginner Women's Clinic #1
10:00 AM Guided Rides - Intermediate
10:15 AM - 10:45 AM Ride Like a Girl! Beginner Women's Clinic #2
11:00 AM Kids Ride & Skills Clinic
11:00 AM Guided Rides - Intermediate
12:00 PM Lunch courtesy of CycleLoft
1:00 PM Guided Rides - Hammer Ride
1:00 PM Guided Ride - Social Ride
2:00 PM Guided Rides - Intermediate

more information here: http://www.mtbadventureseries.org/mtbadventure/fells.htm
item.name: NEMBA mtb adventure series - middlesex fells
